name: Identifying PsyOps in Spirituality
description: Recognizing psychological operations (PsyOps) used to manipulate spiritual seekers and pacify resistance.

cards.title: Understanding Controlled Opposition in Spirituality
cards.description: Exposing how New Age movements are infiltrated to neutralize resistance.
bulletpoints: Recognizing influencers who promote inaction over empowerment.
Understanding false unity and pacification narratives.
How pseudo-spiritual ideologies are used to discourage direct action.
cards.summaryText: Flags pacification influencers, unity rhetoric, and pseudo-spiritual scripts that suppress resistance.

cards.title: Recognizing False Ascension Traps
cards.description: Analyzing how fake enlightenment systems are designed to disempower seekers.
bulletpoints: The dangers of hyper-passivity and escapism.
How spiritual hierarchies mimic cultic power structures.
Identifying disinformation about ascension and DNA activation.
cards.summaryText: Shows how ascension traps push passivity, hierarchy, and bogus DNA myths to derail seekers.

cards.title: Decoding Distorted Energy Practices
cards.description: Understanding how spiritual teachings are manipulated to weaken individuals.
bulletpoints: How certain meditation techniques induce submission instead of empowerment.
Examining energy practices that create dependency on external ‘masters’.
Spotting synthetic frequency manipulations disguised as healing modalities.
cards.summaryText: Highlights submission-inducing meditations, master dependency, and engineered frequencies posing as healing.
